            <div class="clear"></div>
            <div class="postBody">

<p style="color: rgba(43, 43, 43, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">C#中的异步编程是一个强大且复杂的特性，它允许开发者编写非阻塞的代码，从而显著提升应用程序的响应性和吞吐量。本文将深入剖析异步编程的底层原理，从<code style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">async</code>和<code style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">await</code>关键字的工作机制，到状态机、任务调度、线程管理和异常处理等核心概念。</p>
<hr style="border-radius: 0; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: 1px; border-top: 2px solid rgba(59, 170, 250, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 0; margin: 10px 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">
<h2 style="align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: flex; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: center; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 22px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; align-items: unset; background: linear-gradient(0deg, rgba(231, 247, 252, 1) 40%, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0) 40%) left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; color: rgba(112, 188, 234, 1); display: block; font-weight: bold; font-style: normal; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0 10px 0 0; margin: 0; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">1. 异步编程的基础</span></h2>
<h3 style="align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: block; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; border-top: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-bottom: 4px solid rgba(64, 184, 250, 1); border-left: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 20px; color: rgba(64, 184, 250, 1); line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0; align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: flex; font-weight: bold; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 0 0 0 25px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">1.1 什么是异步编程？</span></h3>
<p style="color: rgba(43, 43, 43, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">异步编程是一种编程范式，旨在解决传统同步编程中因等待操作（如I/O或计算）而导致的线程阻塞问题。在同步模型中，调用一个耗时操作会使当前线程暂停，直到操作完成。而在异步模型中，程序可以在等待操作完成的同时继续执行其他任务，从而提高资源利用率和程序的响应性。</p>
<p style="color: rgba(43, 43, 43, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">例如，在处理网络请求时，同步调用会阻塞线程直到响应返回，而异步调用则允许线程去做其他工作，待响应到达时再处理结果。这种特性在I/O密集型场景（如文件读写、网络通信）和高并发场景（如Web服务器）中尤为重要。</p>
<h3 style="align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: block; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; border-top: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-bottom: 4px solid rgba(64, 184, 250, 1); border-left: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 20px; color: rgba(64, 184, 250, 1); line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0; align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: flex; font-weight: bold; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 0 0 0 25px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">1.2 C#中的<code>async</code>和<code>await</code></span></h3>
<p style="color: rgba(43, 43, 43, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">C#通过<code style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">async</code>和<code style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">await</code>关键字简化了异步编程的编写：</p>
<ul style="list-style-type: disc; color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); padding: 0 0 0 25px; margin: 8px 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">
<li>**<code style="background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">async</code>**：标记一个方法为异步方法，表示它可能包含异步操作。通常与<code style="background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">Task</code>或<code style="background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">Task&lt;T&gt;</code>返回类型一起使用。</li>
<li>**<code style="background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">await</code>**：暂停异步方法的执行，等待某个异步操作（通常是<code style="background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">Task</code>）完成，同时释放当前线程。</li>
</ul>
<p style="color: rgba(43, 43, 43, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">以下是一个简单的异步方法示例：</p>
<pre class="custom highlighter-hljs" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><code>public&nbsp;async&nbsp;Task&lt;int&gt;&nbsp;GetNumberAsync()
{
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;await&nbsp;Task.Delay(1000);&nbsp;//&nbsp;模拟1秒延迟
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;return&nbsp;42;
}</code></pre>
<p style="color: rgba(43, 43, 43, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">调用此方法时，<code style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">await Task.Delay(1000)</code>会暂停方法执行，但不会阻塞线程。线程会被释放，待延迟完成后，方法继续执行并返回结果。</p>
<hr style="border-radius: 0; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: 1px; border-top: 2px solid rgba(59, 170, 250, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 0; margin: 10px 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">
<h2 style="align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: flex; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: center; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 22px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; align-items: unset; background: linear-gradient(0deg, rgba(231, 247, 252, 1) 40%, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0) 40%) left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; color: rgba(112, 188, 234, 1); display: block; font-weight: bold; font-style: normal; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0 10px 0 0; margin: 0; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">2. 编译器的魔力：状态机</span></h2>
<h3 style="align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: block; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; border-top: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-bottom: 4px solid rgba(64, 184, 250, 1); border-left: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 20px; color: rgba(64, 184, 250, 1); line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0; align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: flex; font-weight: bold; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 0 0 0 25px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">2.1 异步方法的转换</span></h3>
<p style="color: rgba(43, 43, 43, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">尽管<code style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">async</code>和<code style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">await</code>让异步代码看起来像同步代码，但这背后是C#编译器的复杂工作。当您编写一个<code style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">async</code>方法时，编译器会将其转换为一个<strong style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-weight: bold; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 0; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 0; margin: 0">状态机（State Machine）</strong>，负责管理异步操作的执行流程。</p>
<p style="color: rgba(43, 43, 43, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">状态机是一个自动机，它将方法的执行分解为多个状态，每个状态对应代码中的一个执行阶段（通常是<code style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">await</code>点）。状态机通过暂停和恢复机制，确保方法能在异步操作完成时正确继续执行。</p>
<h3 style="align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: block; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; border-top: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-bottom: 4px solid rgba(64, 184, 250, 1); border-left: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 20px; color: rgba(64, 184, 250, 1); line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0; align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: flex; font-weight: bold; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 0 0 0 25px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">2.2 状态机的结构</span></h3>
<p style="color: rgba(43, 43, 43, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">编译器生成的的状态机通常是一个结构体（在发布模式下以减少分配开销）或类（在调试模式下以便调试），实现了<code style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">IAsyncStateMachine</code>接口。该接口定义了两个方法：</p>
<ul style="list-style-type: disc; color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); padding: 0 0 0 25px; margin: 8px 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">
<li>**<code style="background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">MoveNext</code>**：驱动状态机执行，是状态机的核心逻辑。</li>
<li>**<code style="background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">SetStateMachine</code>**：用于跨AppDomain场景，通常不直接使用。</li>
</ul>
<p style="color: rgba(43, 43, 43, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">状态机包含以下关键字段：</p>
<ul style="list-style-type: disc; color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); padding: 0 0 0 25px; margin: 8px 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">
<li>**<code style="background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">state</code>**：一个整数，表示当前状态（如-1表示初始，0、1等表示等待点，-2表示完成）。</li>
<li>**<code style="background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">builder</code>**：<code style="background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">AsyncTaskMethodBuilder</code>或<code style="background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">AsyncTaskMethodBuilder&lt;T&gt;</code>，用于构建和完成返回的<code style="background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">Task</code>。</li>
<li>**<code style="background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">awaiter</code>**：表示当前等待的异步操作（如<code style="background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">TaskAwaiter</code>）。</li>
</ul>
<h3 style="align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: block; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; border-top: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-bottom: 4px solid rgba(64, 184, 250, 1); border-left: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 20px; color: rgba(64, 184, 250, 1); line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0; align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: flex; font-weight: bold; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 0 0 0 25px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">2.3 状态机的执行流程</span></h3>
<p style="color: rgba(43, 43, 43, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">以<code style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">GetNumberAsync</code>为例，其状态机的执行流程如下：</p>
<ol style="list-style-type: decimal; color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); padding: 0 0 0 25px; margin: 8px 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">
<li><strong style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-weight: bold; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 0; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 0; margin: 0">初始状态（state = -1）</strong>：方法开始执行。</li>
<li>**遇到<code style="background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">await</code>**：检查<code style="background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">Task.Delay(1000)</code>是否已完成。
<ul style="list-style-type: disc; color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); padding: 0 0 0 25px; margin: 8px 0">
<li>如果未完成，状态机将：
<ul style="list-style-type: disc; color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); padding: 0 0 0 25px; margin: 8px 0">
<li>更新<code style="background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">state</code>为0（表示等待第一个<code style="background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">await</code>）。</li>
<li>注册一个延续（continuation），等待任务完成时回调。</li>
<li>返回，释放线程。</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>如果已完成，直接继续执行。</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li><strong style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-weight: bold; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 0; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 0; margin: 0">任务完成</strong>：任务完成时触发延续，状态机恢复：
<ul style="list-style-type: disc; color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); padding: 0 0 0 25px; margin: 8px 0">
<li>检查<code style="background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">state</code>值为0，跳转到<code style="background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">await</code>后的代码。</li>
<li>获取结果，继续执行。</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li><strong style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-weight: bold; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 0; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 0; margin: 0">方法完成（state = -2）</strong>：设置返回值并完成<code style="background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">Task</code>。</li>
</ol>
<p style="color: rgba(43, 43, 43, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">以下是简化的状态机伪代码：</p>
<pre class="custom highlighter-hljs" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><code>private&nbsp;struct&nbsp;GetNumberAsyncStateMachine&nbsp;:&nbsp;IAsyncStateMachine
{
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;public&nbsp;int&nbsp;state;&nbsp;//&nbsp;状态字段
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;public&nbsp;AsyncTaskMethodBuilder&lt;int&gt;&nbsp;builder;&nbsp;//&nbsp;Task构建器
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;private&nbsp;TaskAwaiter&nbsp;awaiter;&nbsp;//&nbsp;等待器

&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;public&nbsp;void&nbsp;MoveNext()
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;{
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;int&nbsp;result;
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;try
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;{
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;if&nbsp;(state&nbsp;==&nbsp;-1)&nbsp;//&nbsp;初始状态
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;{
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;awaiter&nbsp;=&nbsp;Task.Delay(1000).GetAwaiter();
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;if&nbsp;(!awaiter.IsCompleted)&nbsp;//&nbsp;任务未完成
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;{
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;state&nbsp;=&nbsp;0;&nbsp;//&nbsp;等待状态
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;builder.AwaitUnsafeOnCompleted(ref&nbsp;awaiter,&nbsp;ref&nbsp;this);&nbsp;//&nbsp;注册延续
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;return;
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;}
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;goto&nbsp;resume0;&nbsp;//&nbsp;已完成，直接继续
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;}
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;if&nbsp;(state&nbsp;==&nbsp;0)&nbsp;//&nbsp;从await恢复
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;{
resume0:
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;awaiter.GetResult();&nbsp;//&nbsp;获取结果
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;result&nbsp;=&nbsp;42;
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;builder.SetResult(result);&nbsp;//&nbsp;设置返回值
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;state&nbsp;=&nbsp;-2;&nbsp;//&nbsp;完成
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;}
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;}
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;catch&nbsp;(Exception&nbsp;ex)
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;{
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;builder.SetException(ex);&nbsp;//&nbsp;设置异常
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;state&nbsp;=&nbsp;-2;
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;}
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;}
}</code></pre>
<h3 style="align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: block; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; border-top: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-bottom: 4px solid rgba(64, 184, 250, 1); border-left: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 20px; color: rgba(64, 184, 250, 1); line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0; align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: flex; font-weight: bold; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 0 0 0 25px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">2.4 状态机图示</span></h3>
<p style="color: rgba(43, 43, 43, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">为了更直观地理解，我们将从宏观角度理解状态机（State Machine）的组件及其交互逻辑，以下是一个状态机流程图：</p>
<div style="text-align: center"><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/365286/202506/365286-20250604110126955-1686677433.png" alt="https://vkontech.com/exploring-the-async-await-state-machine-series-overview/" style="display: block; max-width: 100%; border-radius: 8px; object-fit: fill; box-shadow: 2px 4px 8px rgba(153, 153, 153, 1); border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); margin: 0 auto">https://vkontech.com/exploring-the-async-await-state-machine-series-overview/</div>
<hr style="border-radius: 0; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: 1px; border-top: 2px solid rgba(59, 170, 250, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 0; margin: 10px 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">
<h2 style="align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: flex; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: center; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 22px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; align-items: unset; background: linear-gradient(0deg, rgba(231, 247, 252, 1) 40%, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0) 40%) left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; color: rgba(112, 188, 234, 1); display: block; font-weight: bold; font-style: normal; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0 10px 0 0; margin: 0; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">3. 任务（Task）的奥秘</span></h2>
<h3 style="align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: block; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; border-top: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-bottom: 4px solid rgba(64, 184, 250, 1); border-left: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 20px; color: rgba(64, 184, 250, 1); line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0; align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: flex; font-weight: bold; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 0 0 0 25px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">3.1 Task的定义</span></h3>
<p style="color: rgba(43, 43, 43, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><code style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">Task</code>是C#异步编程的核心类，位于<code style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">System.Threading.Tasks</code>命名空间。它表示一个异步操作，可以是计算任务、I/O操作或任何异步工作。<code style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">Task&lt;T&gt;</code>是带返回值的版本。</p>
<h3 style="align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: block; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; border-top: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-bottom: 4px solid rgba(64, 184, 250, 1); border-left: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 20px; color: rgba(64, 184, 250, 1); line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0; align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: flex; font-weight: bold; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 0 0 0 25px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">3.2 Task的生命周期</span></h3>
<p style="color: rgba(43, 43, 43, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><code style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">Task</code>有以下状态（通过<code style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">Task.Status</code>属性查看）：</p>
<ul style="list-style-type: disc; color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); padding: 0 0 0 25px; margin: 8px 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">
<li><strong style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-weight: bold; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 0; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 0; margin: 0">Created</strong>：已创建但未调度。</li>
<li><strong style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-weight: bold; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 0; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 0; margin: 0">WaitingToRun</strong>：已调度但等待执行。</li>
<li><strong style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-weight: bold; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 0; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 0; margin: 0">Running</strong>：正在执行。</li>
<li><strong style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-weight: bold; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 0; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 0; margin: 0">RanToCompletion</strong>：成功完成。</li>
<li><strong style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-weight: bold; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 0; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 0; margin: 0">Faulted</strong>：发生异常。</li>
<li><strong style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-weight: bold; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 0; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 0; margin: 0">Canceled</strong>：被取消。</li>
</ul>
<h3 style="align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: block; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; border-top: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-bottom: 4px solid rgba(64, 184, 250, 1); border-left: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 20px; color: rgba(64, 184, 250, 1); line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0; align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: flex; font-weight: bold; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 0 0 0 25px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">3.3 Task的调度</span></h3>
<p style="color: rgba(43, 43, 43, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><code style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">Task</code>的执行由<strong style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-weight: bold; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 0; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 0; margin: 0">任务调度器（TaskScheduler）</strong>管理。默认调度器使用<strong style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-weight: bold; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 0; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 0; margin: 0">线程池（ThreadPool）</strong>来执行任务。线程池是一个预分配的线程集合，可以重用线程，避免频繁创建和销毁线程的开销。</p>
<p style="color: rgba(43, 43, 43, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">创建<code style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">Task</code>的方式包括：</p>
<ul style="list-style-type: disc; color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); padding: 0 0 0 25px; margin: 8px 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">
<li>**<code style="background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">Task.Run</code>**：将任务调度到线程池执行。</li>
<li>**<code style="background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">Task.Factory.StartNew</code>**：更灵活的创建方式。</li>
<li><strong style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-weight: bold; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 0; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 0; margin: 0">异步方法返回的Task</strong>：由<code style="background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">AsyncTaskMethodBuilder</code>管理。</li>
</ul>
<h3 style="align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: block; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; border-top: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-bottom: 4px solid rgba(64, 184, 250, 1); border-left: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 20px; color: rgba(64, 184, 250, 1); line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0; align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: flex; font-weight: bold; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 0 0 0 25px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">3.4 I/O-bound vs CPU-bound任务</span></h3>
<ul style="list-style-type: disc; color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); padding: 0 0 0 25px; margin: 8px 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">
<li><strong style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-weight: bold; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 0; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 0; margin: 0">I/O-bound任务</strong>：如网络请求（<code style="background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">HttpClient.GetAsync</code>）、文件操作（<code style="background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">File.ReadAllTextAsync</code>），使用异步I/O机制，通常不占用线程，而是通过操作系统提供的回调完成。</li>
<li><strong style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-weight: bold; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 0; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 0; margin: 0">CPU-bound任务</strong>：如复杂计算（<code style="background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">Task.Run(() =&gt; Compute())</code>），在线程池线程上执行。</li>
</ul>
<p style="color: rgba(43, 43, 43, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">例如：</p>
<pre class="custom highlighter-hljs" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><code>public&nbsp;async&nbsp;Task&lt;string&gt;&nbsp;FetchDataAsync()
{
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;using&nbsp;var&nbsp;client&nbsp;=&nbsp;new&nbsp;HttpClient();
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;return&nbsp;await&nbsp;client.GetStringAsync("https://example.com");&nbsp;//&nbsp;I/O-bound
}

public&nbsp;Task&lt;int&gt;&nbsp;ComputeAsync()
{
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;return&nbsp;Task.Run(()&nbsp;=&gt;&nbsp;{&nbsp;/*&nbsp;CPU密集型计算&nbsp;*/&nbsp;return&nbsp;42;&nbsp;});&nbsp;//&nbsp;CPU-bound
}</code></pre>
<hr style="border-radius: 0; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: 1px; border-top: 2px solid rgba(59, 170, 250, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 0; margin: 10px 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">
<h2 style="align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: flex; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: center; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 22px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; align-items: unset; background: linear-gradient(0deg, rgba(231, 247, 252, 1) 40%, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0) 40%) left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; color: rgba(112, 188, 234, 1); display: block; font-weight: bold; font-style: normal; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0 10px 0 0; margin: 0; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">4. 线程管理和上下文</span></h2>
<p style="color: rgba(43, 43, 43, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">异步编程的核心目标是<strong style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-weight: bold; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 0; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 0; margin: 0">避免线程阻塞</strong>，而不是频繁切换线程。想象一个应用程序，比如一个带有用户界面的程序，主线程（通常是UI线程）负责处理用户交互、绘制界面等任务。如果某个操作（比如网络请求或文件读写）需要很长时间，主线程如果傻等，就会导致程序卡顿。异步编程通过将耗时任务“<strong style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-weight: bold; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 0; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 0; margin: 0">卸载</strong>”出去，让主线程继续执行其他工作，从而保持程序的响应性。</p>
<p style="color: rgba(43, 43, 43, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">在C#中，<code style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">async</code>和<code style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">await</code>关键字极大简化了异步编程，但其底层依赖于<strong style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-weight: bold; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 0; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 0; margin: 0">状态机</strong>和<strong style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-weight: bold; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 0; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 0; margin: 0">任务调度</strong>。</p>
<blockquote class="custom-blockquote multiquote-1" style="border-radius: 8px; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(64, 184, 250, 0.1); width: auto; height: auto; box-shadow: 0 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); display: block; overflow-x: auto; overflow-y: auto; border: 1px solid rgba(64, 184, 255, 0.4); padding: 10px 10px 10px 20px; margin: 20px 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span style="display: block; color: rgba(64, 184, 250, 0.5); font-size: 28px; line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; font-weight: bold">❝</span>
<p style="text-indent: 0; color: rgba(59, 59, 59, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; font-weight: normal; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0">异步并不总是意味着线程切换，而是通过合理的任务分配和通知机制实现非阻塞。</p>
</blockquote>
<h3 style="align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: block; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; border-top: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-bottom: 4px solid rgba(64, 184, 250, 1); border-left: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 20px; color: rgba(64, 184, 250, 1); line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0; align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: flex; font-weight: bold; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 0 0 0 25px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">4.1 线程切换是如何发生的？</span></h3>
<p style="color: rgba(43, 43, 43, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">异步操作中是否涉及线程切换，取决于任务的类型和执行环境。我们可以把任务分为两类：</p>
<ol style="list-style-type: decimal; color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); padding: 0 0 0 25px; margin: 8px 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">
<li>
<p style="color: rgba(43, 43, 43, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0"><strong style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-weight: bold; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 0; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 0; margin: 0">I/O密集型任务（I/O-bound）</strong></p>
<ul style="list-style-type: disc; color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); padding: 0 0 0 25px; margin: 8px 0">
<li>比如网络请求、文件读写等，这些任务通常由系统内核或线程池线程在后台处理。</li>
<li>主线程发起请求后，立即返回，不会被阻塞。当任务完成时，系统通过回调或延续（continuation）通知主线程。</li>
<li><strong style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-weight: bold; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 0; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 0; margin: 0">例子</strong>：你调用<code style="background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">HttpClient.GetAsync()</code>，主线程发起请求后继续执行，网络操作由底层线程池或系统完成，结果回来时触发延续。</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>
<p style="color: rgba(43, 43, 43, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0"><strong style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-weight: bold; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 0; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 0; margin: 0">CPU密集型任务（CPU-bound）</strong></p>
<ul style="list-style-type: disc; color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); padding: 0 0 0 25px; margin: 8px 0">
<li>比如复杂的数学计算，这种任务可以交给线程池线程执行，避免阻塞主线程。</li>
<li><strong style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-weight: bold; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 0; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 0; margin: 0">例子</strong>：用<code style="background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">Task.Run()</code>将计算任务交给线程池，主线程继续处理其他逻辑。</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ol>
<p style="color: rgba(43, 43, 43, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">需要注意的是，在某些情况下，异步操作可能根本不涉及线程切换。例如，一个同步完成的I/O操作（比如从缓存读取数据）或使用<code style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">Task.Yield()</code>，都可能在同一线程上完成。</p>
<h3 style="align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: block; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; border-top: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-bottom: 4px solid rgba(64, 184, 250, 1); border-left: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 20px; color: rgba(64, 184, 250, 1); line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0; align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: flex; font-weight: bold; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 0 0 0 25px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">4.2 C#中async/await的工作原理</span></h3>
<p style="color: rgba(43, 43, 43, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">在C#中，当你使用<code style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">async</code>和<code style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">await</code>时，编译器会将方法转化为一个<strong style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-weight: bold; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 0; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 0; margin: 0">状态机</strong>。这个状态机负责：</p>
<ul style="list-style-type: disc; color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); padding: 0 0 0 25px; margin: 8px 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">
<li>在<code style="background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">await</code>处暂停方法的执行。</li>
<li>设置一个延续（continuation），表示任务完成后要继续执行的代码。</li>
<li>当任务完成时，触发状态机恢复执行，从<code style="background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">await</code>后的代码继续。</li>
</ul>
<p style="color: rgba(43, 43, 43, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><strong style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-weight: bold; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 0; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 0; margin: 0">关键机制</strong>：</p>
<ul style="list-style-type: disc; color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); padding: 0 0 0 25px; margin: 8px 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">
<li>同步上下文（SynchronizationContext）：在UI应用中，<code style="background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">await</code>会捕获当前的同步上下文（通常是UI线程上下文），确保任务完成后的延续回到UI线程执行，以便更新界面。</li>
<li><code style="background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">ConfigureAwait(false)</code>：如果不需要回到原线程（比如在服务器端代码中），可以用这个选项让延续在线程池线程上执行，减少线程切换开销。</li>
</ul>
<h3 style="align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: block; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; border-top: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-bottom: 4px solid rgba(64, 184, 250, 1); border-left: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 20px; color: rgba(64, 184, 250, 1); line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0; align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: flex; font-weight: bold; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 0 0 0 25px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">4.3 线程切换的开销</span></h3>
<p style="color: rgba(43, 43, 43, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">线程切换涉及上下文切换（保存和恢复线程状态），开销不小。因此，异步编程的目标是<strong style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-weight: bold; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 0; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 0; margin: 0">减少不必要的切换</strong>。比如：</p>
<ul style="list-style-type: disc; color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); padding: 0 0 0 25px; margin: 8px 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">
<li>在UI应用中，延续默认回到UI线程，确保界面更新安全。</li>
<li>在服务器端，<code style="background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">ConfigureAwait(false)</code>可以避免切换回原上下文，提升性能。</li>
</ul>
<blockquote class="custom-blockquote multiquote-1" style="border-radius: 8px; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(64, 184, 250, 0.1); width: auto; height: auto; box-shadow: 0 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); display: block; overflow-x: auto; overflow-y: auto; border: 1px solid rgba(64, 184, 255, 0.4); padding: 10px 10px 10px 20px; margin: 20px 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span style="display: block; color: rgba(64, 184, 250, 0.5); font-size: 28px; line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0; text-align: left; font-weight: bold">❝</span>
<p style="text-indent: 0; color: rgba(59, 59, 59, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; font-weight: normal; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0">异步编程通过将耗时任务委托给后台线程或系统内核，避免主线程阻塞，而不是依赖频繁的线程切换。你的比喻基本合理，尤其是“主线程交给另一辆车”的想法，但需要强调主线程不等待、结果通过信号通知的特点。改进后的比喻更准确地反映了异步的非阻塞特性和线程管理机制。</p>
</blockquote>
<h3 style="align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: block; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; border-top: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-bottom: 4px solid rgba(64, 184, 250, 1); border-left: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 20px; color: rgba(64, 184, 250, 1); line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0; align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: flex; font-weight: bold; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 0 0 0 25px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">4.4 几个重要概念</span></h3>
<h4 style="align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: block; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 18px; color: rgba(245, 172, 7, 1); line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0; align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; border-top: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-bottom: 2px solid rgba(245, 172, 7, 1); border-left: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); padding: 2px 10px; margin: 0">4.4.1 同步上下文（SynchronizationContext）</span></h4>
