<p style="color: rgba(43, 43, 43, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><strong style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-weight: bold; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 0; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 0; margin: 0">同步上下文</strong>是一个抽象类，用于在特定线程或上下文中执行代码。在UI应用程序（如WPF、WinForms）中，UI线程有一个特定的<code style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">SynchronizationContext</code>，确保UI更新在UI线程上执行。</p>
<p style="color: rgba(43, 43, 43, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><code style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">await</code>默认会捕获当前的同步上下文，并在任务完成后恢复到该上下文执行后续代码。例如：</p>
<pre class="custom highlighter-hljs" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><code>private&nbsp;async&nbsp;void&nbsp;Button_Click(object&nbsp;sender,&nbsp;EventArgs&nbsp;e)
{
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;await&nbsp;Task.Delay(1000);
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;label.Text&nbsp;=&nbsp;"Done";&nbsp;//&nbsp;自动恢复到UI线程
}</code></pre>
<h4 style="align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: block; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 18px; color: rgba(245, 172, 7, 1); line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0; align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; border-top: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-bottom: 2px solid rgba(245, 172, 7, 1); border-left: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); padding: 2px 10px; margin: 0">4.4.2 ConfigureAwait 的作用</span></h4>
<p style="color: rgba(43, 43, 43, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><code style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">ConfigureAwait(bool continueOnCapturedContext)</code>允许控制是否恢复到原始上下文：</p>
<ul style="list-style-type: disc; color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); padding: 0 0 0 25px; margin: 8px 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">
<li>**<code style="background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">true</code>**（默认）：恢复到捕获的上下文。</li>
<li>**<code style="background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">false</code>**：在任务完成后的任意线程上继续执行。</li>
</ul>
<p style="color: rgba(43, 43, 43, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">在服务器端代码中，使用<code style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">ConfigureAwait(false)</code>可以避免不必要的上下文切换：</p>
<pre class="custom highlighter-hljs" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><code>public&nbsp;async&nbsp;Task&lt;string&gt;&nbsp;GetDataAsync()
{
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;await&nbsp;Task.Delay(1000).ConfigureAwait(false);
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;return&nbsp;"Data";&nbsp;//&nbsp;不恢复到原始上下文
}</code></pre>
<p style="color: rgba(43, 43, 43, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">即使有人对<code style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">async/await</code>的工作流程有了相当不错的理解，但对于嵌套异步调用链的行为仍有很多困惑。尤其是讨论到在库代码中何时以及如何使用<code style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">ConfigureAwait(false)</code>时，这种困惑更为明显。接下来我们通过下面的流程图，探索一个非常具体的示例，并深入理解每一个执行步骤：</p>
<div style="text-align: center"><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/365286/202506/365286-20250604110126964-1151701573.jpg" alt="https://vkontech.com/exploring-the-async-await-state-machine-series-overview/" style="display: block; max-width: 100%; border-radius: 8px; object-fit: fill; box-shadow: 2px 4px 8px rgba(153, 153, 153, 1); border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); margin: 0 auto">https://vkontech.com/exploring-the-async-await-state-machine-series-overview/</div>
<h4 style="align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: block; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 18px; color: rgba(245, 172, 7, 1); line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0; align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; border-top: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-bottom: 2px solid rgba(245, 172, 7, 1); border-left: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); padding: 2px 10px; margin: 0">4.4.3 执行上下文（ExecutionContext）</span></h4>
<p style="color: rgba(43, 43, 43, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><strong style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-weight: bold; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 0; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 0; margin: 0">执行上下文</strong>维护线程的执行环境，包括安全上下文、调用上下文等。在异步操作中，<code style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">ExecutionContext</code>会被捕获并在延续时恢复，确保线程局部数据（如<code style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">ThreadLocal&lt;T&gt;</code>）的正确性。</p>
<hr style="border-radius: 0; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: 1px; border-top: 2px solid rgba(59, 170, 250, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 0; margin: 10px 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">
<h2 style="align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: flex; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: center; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 22px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; align-items: unset; background: linear-gradient(0deg, rgba(231, 247, 252, 1) 40%, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0) 40%) left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; color: rgba(112, 188, 234, 1); display: block; font-weight: bold; font-style: normal; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0 10px 0 0; margin: 0; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">5. 异常处理机制</span></h2>
<h3 style="align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: block; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; border-top: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-bottom: 4px solid rgba(64, 184, 250, 1); border-left: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 20px; color: rgba(64, 184, 250, 1); line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0; align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: flex; font-weight: bold; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 0 0 0 25px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">5.1 异常的捕获和传播</span></h3>
<p style="color: rgba(43, 43, 43, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">在异步方法中，抛出的异常会被捕获并存储在返回的<code style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">Task</code>中。当<code style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">await</code>该<code style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">Task</code>时，异常会被重新抛出。例如：</p>
<pre class="custom highlighter-hljs" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><code>public&nbsp;async&nbsp;Task&nbsp;ThrowAsync()
{
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;await&nbsp;Task.Delay(1000);
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;throw&nbsp;new&nbsp;Exception("Error");
}

public&nbsp;async&nbsp;Task&nbsp;CallAsync()
{
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;try
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;{
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;await&nbsp;ThrowAsync();
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;}
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;catch&nbsp;(Exception&nbsp;ex)
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;{
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Console.WriteLine(ex.Message);&nbsp;//&nbsp;输出&nbsp;"Error"
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;}
}</code></pre>
<h3 style="align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: block; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; border-top: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-bottom: 4px solid rgba(64, 184, 250, 1); border-left: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 20px; color: rgba(64, 184, 250, 1); line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0; align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: flex; font-weight: bold; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 0 0 0 25px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">5.2 状态机中的异常处理</span></h3>
<p style="color: rgba(43, 43, 43, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">状态机的<code style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">MoveNext</code>方法包含try-catch块，捕获异常并通过<code style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">builder.SetException</code>设置到<code style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">Task</code>中，如前述伪代码所示。</p>
<h3 style="align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: block; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; border-top: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-bottom: 4px solid rgba(64, 184, 250, 1); border-left: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 20px; color: rgba(64, 184, 250, 1); line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0; align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: flex; font-weight: bold; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 0 0 0 25px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">5.3 聚合异常</span></h3>
<p style="color: rgba(43, 43, 43, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">如果一个<code style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">Task</code>等待多个子任务（如<code style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; margin: 0 2px">Task.WhenAll</code>），可能会抛出<code style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); <h3 style="align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: block; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; border-top: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-bottom: 4px solid rgba(64, 184, 250, 1); border-left: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 20px; color: rgba(64, 184, 250, 1); line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0; align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: flex; font-weight: bold; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 0 0 0 25px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">6.1 Awaiter模式</span></h3>
<p style="color: rgba(43, 43, 43, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">C#支持await任何实现了<strong style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-weight: bold; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 0; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 0; margin: 0">awaiter模式</strong>的类型，要求：</p>
<ul style="list-style-type: disc; color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); padding: 0 0 0 25px; margin: 8px 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">
<li>提供<code style="background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">GetAwaiter</code>方法，返回一个awaiter对象。</li>
<li>awaiter实现<code style="background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">INotifyCompletion</code>（或<code style="background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">ICriticalNotifyCompletion</code>），并提供：
<ul style="list-style-type: disc; color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); padding: 0 0 0 25px; margin: 8px 0">
<li><code style="background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">bool IsCompleted</code>：指示任务是否完成。</li>
<li><code style="background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">GetResult</code>：获取结果或抛出异常。</li>

</li>
</ul>
<h3 style="align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: block; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; border-top: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-bottom: 4px solid rgba(64, 184, 250, 1); border-left: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 20px; color: rgba(64, 184, 250, 1); line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0; align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: flex; font-weight: bold; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 0 0 0 25px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">6.2 自定义Awaiter的用途</span></h3>
<p style="color: rgba(43, 43, 43, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">例如，<code style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">ValueTask&lt;T&gt;</code>是一个轻量级替代<code style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">Task&lt;T&gt;</code>的结构，用于高频调用场景减少内存分配：</p>
<pre class="custom highlighter-hljs" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><code>public&nbsp;ValueTask&lt;int&gt;&nbsp;ComputeValueAsync()

<h2 style="align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: flex; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: center; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 22px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; align-items: unset; background: linear-gradient(0deg, rgba(231, 247, 252, 1) 40%, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0) 40%) left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; color: rgba(112, 188, 234, 1); display: block; font-weight: bold; font-style: normal; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0 10px 0 0; margin: 0; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">7. 实际应用与示例分析</span></h2>
<h3 style="align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: block; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; border-top: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-bottom: 4px solid rgba(64, 184, 250, 1); border-left: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 20px; color: rgba(64, 184, 250, 1); line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0; align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: flex; font-weight: bold; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 0 0 0 25px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">7.1 异步方法的编写</span></h3>
<p style="color: rgba(43, 43, 43, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">编写异步方法的最佳实践：</p>
<ul style="list-style-type: disc; color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); padding: 0 0 0 25px; margin: 8px 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">
<li>使用<code style="background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">async Task</code>或<code style="background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">async Task&lt;T&gt;</code>作为返回类型。</li>
<li>避免<code style="background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">async void</code>，除非是事件处理程序。</li>
<li>在非UI代码中使用<code style="background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">ConfigureAwait(false)</code>。</li>
</ul>
<h3 style="align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: block; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; border-top: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-bottom: 4px solid rgba(64, 184, 250, 1); border-left: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 20px; color: rgba(64, 184, 250, 1); line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0; align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: flex; font-weight: bold; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 0 0 0 25px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">7.2 异步流（C# 8.0+）</span></h3>
<p style="color: rgba(43, 43, 43, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">异步流（<code style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">IAsyncEnumerable&lt;T&gt;</code>）允许异步生成和消费数据序列：</p>
<pre class="custom highlighter-hljs" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><code>public&nbsp;async&nbsp;IAsyncEnumerable&lt;int&gt;&nbsp;GenerateNumbersAsync()
{
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;for&nbsp;(int&nbsp;i&nbsp;=&nbsp;0;&nbsp;i&nbsp;&lt;&nbsp;5;&nbsp;i++)
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;{
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;await&nbsp;Task.Delay(100);
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yield&nbsp;return&nbsp;i;
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;}
}

await&nbsp;foreach&nbsp;(var&nbsp;number&nbsp;in&nbsp;GenerateNumbersAsync())
{
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Console.WriteLine(number);
}</code></pre>
<hr style="border-radius: 0; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: 1px; border-top: 2px solid rgba(59, 170, 250, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 0; margin: 10px 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">
<h2 style="align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: flex; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: center; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 22px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; align-items: unset; background: linear-gradient(0deg, rgba(231, 247, 252, 1) 40%, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0) 40%) left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; color: rgba(112, 188, 234, 1); display: block; font-weight: bold; font-style: normal; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0 10px 0 0; margin: 0; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">8. 总结与实践建议</span></h2>
<p style="color: rgba(43, 43, 43, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">C#的异步编程通过<code style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">async</code>和<code style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">await</code>，结合状态机、任务调度和线程管理，实现了高效的非阻塞代码。其底层原理包括：</p>
<ul style="list-style-type: disc; color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); padding: 0 0 0 25px; margin: 8px 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">
<li><strong style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-weight: bold; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 0; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 0; margin: 0">状态机</strong>：编译器将异步方法转换为状态机，管理暂停和恢复。</li>
<li><strong style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-weight: bold; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 0; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 0; margin: 0">Task</strong>：表示异步操作，由任务调度器和线程池执行。</li>
<li><strong style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-weight: bold; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 0; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 0; margin: 0">上下文</strong>：同步上下文和执行上下文确保线程安全性。</li>
<li><strong style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-weight: bold; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 0; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 0; margin: 0">异常处理</strong>：异常在Task中传播，await时重新抛出。</li>
</ul>
<p style="color: rgba(43, 43, 43, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><strong style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-weight: bold; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 0; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 0; margin: 0">实践建议</strong>：</p>
<ul style="list-style-type: disc; color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); padding: 0 0 0 25px; margin: 8px 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">
<li>使用<code style="background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">ConfigureAwait(false)</code>优化服务器端性能。</li>
<li>确保异常在合适的地方被捕获和处理。</li>
<li>将CPU-bound任务调度到线程池，避免阻塞UI线程。</li>
<li>利用异步流处理大数据或实时数据。</li>
</ul>
<p style="color: rgba(43, 43, 43, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">通过理解这些底层机制，有助于我们更高效地编写异步代码，从而构建高性能、可伸缩的应用程序。</p>
<h2 style="align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: flex; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: center; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 22px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; align-items: unset; background: linear-gradient(0deg, rgba(231, 247, 252, 1) 40%, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0) 40%) left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; color: rgba(112, 188, 234, 1); display: block; font-weight: bold; font-style: normal; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0 10px 0 0; margin: 0; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">9. 参考链接</span></h2>
